1.content:
Our characters are as follows-- You can decide their genders in this chapter, and are free to characterize them however you want, but here are some guidelines:
Eevee - Small, but gluttonous. Large meals lead to large amounts of gas.

Flareon - Fire-type status affects digestive system, leads to more potent gas, and more of it.

Vaporeon - Belly is remarkably noisy when gassy-- a clear warning sign to stay away.

Jolteon - Bit of a "wild card"-- might feel fine one day, only to be farting up a storm the next.

Espeon - Most outwardly-charming of the Eeveelutions-- also nearly as gassy as Umbreon, much to their dismay.

Umbreon - Gassiest Eeveelution on average-- bit rude, so they don't seem to mind it too much, either.

Glaceon - Only somewhat gassy-- until Pecha berries are involved, at which point things get bloated quickly.

Leafeon - Can avoid gas-related issues through photosynthesis. Gets extra-gassy when they actually eat as a result, though.

Sylveon - Externally cute! Just as much of a glutton as Eevee, though. Beware! They love using other Pokémon to muffle their farts.
1.title: Our expositional introduction.

11.content: Welp. I said no choice chapters, but, time to make your pick of which Eeveelutions you'll be working with.
11.title: Female

choices: ... rest a bit and let some gas build.
111.content:
The small, brown-furred Pokémon gave a content sigh, licking over her overstuffed belly as it began working on the meal she'd pilfered from a wandering trainer. She could tell that her little feast was already putting considerable strain on her gut, stirring up quite a few none-too-happy grumbles and groans... not that she minded. The others were used to this from her by now. Speaking of which, now that she was all full-up, Eevee felt like going home and meeting up with her siblings.

         It was quite a distance to walk from where she'd stolen her latest meal to the cute little burrow that she and her siblings had dug out under a tree in the woods. Long enough, in fact, that her belly had already churned up some gas-- enough to the point where she was a bit too bloated to get through! Not that this has stopped the Normal-type in the past-- she simply pushed in, forcing a rather loud PFFFBBBRRRRT!~ from her backside. The gassy blast served as a kind of alarm, and a few of the Eeveelutions in the den (those who weren't soundly asleep, of course) gave a somewhat tired-sounding "Welcome back, Eevee..." It WAS still early in the day, after all.

The first thing Eevee did upon her return was...
111.title: Eevee

1111.content:
Though ripping some big farts were fun, Eevee was in the mood to hold a lot of gas in today. She made her way to a little corner of the main area of their den to rest a bit. She was already getting bloated, and she wanted to see just how bloated she can get. As her hearty meal was being digested, Eevee’s gut continued to produce more and more gas. She couldn’t imagine what horrific smells were being held in right now, and she couldn’t wait until she was a ticking time bomb!

         After some time, Eevee could feel pressure grow in a large portion of her intestines, indicating that she had a lot of gas inside. But she wanted to hold more. She wanted to be able to fill every inch of the burrow with her gas! She wanted to show her sisters just how much she can stink!

         Her sisters watched on, a little worried. She was holding in quite a bit of gas, and she looked determined to hold more!

         Even more gas was on the way, but can she handle it?
1111.title: ... rest a bit and let some gas build.

choices: Eevee still has gas left inside her. Continue the torture
One of the other Eeveelutions wants a turn. They swap spots with Eevee
Espeon manages to slip away, and get her revenge.
1112.content:
Eevee entered the burrow and walked straight to the back of the room where some of the other Eeveelutions were sleeping. Eevee crept up next to Espeon, and softly placed her rump on her companions face. All the other Eeveelutions would often make fun of Espeon in this way because they knew how disgusted she gets from farting. Anyway, Eevee had a gut absolutely full of gas today, because she loved letting it build up and pressurize throughout her whole day. The other awake Eeveelutions understood quickly what was going one, and came to watch the surprise. Once Eevee's rear was aligned with Espeon's snout, she slammed herself down on her victim. At the same time, some of the others grabbed Espeon's limbs to restrain her in place. Espeon suddenly woke up, realized what was going on, and tried struggling to no avail. There was no way she could match the strength of some of the other Eeveelutions, let alone 5-6 of them holding her down. When Eevee was ready, she pushed out all of her accumulated gas, resulting in a 20-30 second ripper. These fumes were trapped in the small space between Eevee's butt and Espeon's nose. For Espeon, there was no escape. She thrashed side to side but still couldn't get herself away from that god-awful smell.

What happens next in the story?
1112.title: Didn't see that one coming

choices: Espeon lets a massive one rip, depleting most of her gas in one go!
Espeon starts off slow with some weak poots.
11123.content:
A decent amount of time had passed for Espeon to huff up every last puff of Eevee's gas. After the deflated fox wiggled her butt to let out a few small poots that had somehow creeped up on her following her concentrated fart nuke, she giggled maniacally. "Aw geez, that felt suuuuper great to let out, thanks for being my butt pillow through it all, Espy!" She teased her fellow Eeveelution with a few butt bounces, though now she was beginning to hear more from her than just helpless coughing. "Hm?"

"Nnnnggg.. S-so sick and.. tired of you all.. stinking me up on purpose.." Espeon grumbled before a purple glow emanated from her, then from the rest of the Eeveelutions, including Eevee!

"W-woaahhh! It's just a little gas, sis, take it easy!" Eevee suggested, feeling her body get lifted off of the payback-seeking physic and watching everyone else get pushed away from her too.

"Hmph, 'just a little gas,' huh?" Espeon mocked. After wheezing out some of Eevee's gas from her lungs, she stood up on all-fours in front of Eevee, releasing her grasp from the other Eeveelutions and focusing it on that smug vee to flip her upside down and keep her floating in the air. "As much as I hated doing it, I used some Physic to compress and store gas for anyone who decided to lay even a little toot on me.."

Eevee tilted her head and flicked her ears confusedly and worriedly. Espeon's belly didn't look bloated at all! How much gas did she store in there, exactly? "Ummm, Espeon? I'm sor-" She suddenly fell to the ground, yelping at the impact. She was on her back and glanced up at Espeon, who was already hovering her rear over her by the time she looked. "I said I'm s-" Her speech got incredibly muffled as her face was immediately sat on before she could even say the magic words. She felt rather embarrassed that all of her sisters were now witnessing the tables get turned on her, let alone by Espeon!
11123.title: Espeon manages to slip away, and get her revenge.

choices: Leave the den and fart outside
Hold it in until the feeling goes away
Ignore it and hope it doesn't become an issue later
1121.content:
Flareon had gotten on the bad side of her sisters. She's usually very hungry, leading to her eating the second-most of them all, just behind Eevee. However, her stomach never agrees with her, no matter what she puts in it. After every meal, Flareon would begin to get really gassy, and despite her best efforts, she would release several stink bombs in their den, much to the dismay of everyone else. She tries to help with her flatulence issue by eating less, holding in her gas, etc, but it always ends the same: every room smelling like whatever they had before except it was several months old.

         At the current time, the Eeveelutions had their lunch, mixed berries, about an hour ago. Flareon did her best to control herself, but she still ate quite a lot. Right now, she was just sleeping in her room, dreaming about nothing in particular. Suddenly, a painful ache in her belly brought her out of her slumber and drew her attention. She knew this meant that gas was building up inside her, and would soon be demanding a way out. This made her worried, since Espeon approached her that morning after her first gas bomb and told her that if she did this again, they would have to kick her out of the den for the sake of the rest of the sisters. Flareon was very fond of her room, but she knew that if she didn't act quick, her gas would explode out of her and she would be left without a home. She considered her options: 1) Get out the den and far enough to relieve herself without disturbing her sisters, 2) Try to hold it in until it subsides, or 3) Just ingore it and hope for the best. She knew the bathroom wouldn't contain all her gas.

She began to feel the pressure in her bowels and butt grow in intensity, which meant that time was running out. What did she do?
1121.title: Flareon: Danger is Brewing

11212.content:
Flareon decided that the best course of action was to hold it in for the time being. It can be scary outside, and maybe she can get a chance to relieve herself later. However, pure muscle strength is not gonna cut it (Well, it's gonna cut the cheese). So, she covers her quite big butt with her tail and looks for something to plug herself up with.

         10 minutes, and no luck. Neither she nor the rest of her sisters had proper butt plugs, and other options were few. The best options she could find were some duct tape and a vat cork. She couldn't fit either of these on her behind by herself, but she was growing desperate. Her stomach was gurgling and bubbling nonstop, and her butt felt overfilled with gas. She was beginning to tremble because of the bloating. She crossed her hind legs and shook her butt in a dance of desperation. She had to act fast, or else she was gonna blow. She quickly grabbed one of the items and hopped out of her room, letting loose a mini fart every time she landed, much to her dismay. She sought out one of her sisters to help her apply it to her butt. What did she bring with her?
11212.title: Dam it up!

choices: Try to find Glaceon, Jolteon, Leafeon, or Sylveon
112122.content:
Flareon weighed her options. Tape was an option, but there were a few problems with it. First of all, her gas could easily push the tape off. In addition to that, she would be unable to further assist the tape in stopping her gas. However, a cork was more effective. It would be much better at plugging up her butt, and she could clench her butt to help keep it in. Between the two, a cork seemed like the better choice.

         Now, Flareon had another problem on her hands. Just who would she seek out help from? Espeon was a obvious no-go, she would likely just chew her out for trying to hold it in like this and force her outside. She had no idea where Glaceon, Jolteon, Leafeon, or Sylveon were, so she would have to find them. However, she knew that Eevee, Umbreon, and Vaporeon were just in the other room. Eevee was a possible choice, and so was Umbreon and Vaporeon. Umbreon and Vaporeon were probably much more understanding, and would help her out. Eevee just looks up to her sisters, and would certainly say yes. However, Flareon wasn’t certain if Eevee could do it, she was smaller weaker than the rest of them...

         Just who should she seek out help from? Should she ask one of the three in the other room? Or should she try to find one of the others? She needed to hurry, because the gas inside her wasn’t going away any time soon...
112122.title: She brought the cork

choices: Yes, but she must excuse herself
11213.content:
Flareon decided that the best course of action would be to simply ignore the pressure and wait for it to go away. She felt that by doing this, she could practice keeping it under her control. So, she walked out her room and went into the living room, where Sylveon was there, watching television. She sat down next to the Fairy Type to join her.

         Sylveon looked over at Flareon. "Oh, hey Flareon! Wanna watch this sit com with me?" "Sure, sit coms are my fav," she replied. TV was the best thing to get her mind off the time bomb in her bowels. Sylveon smiled, but as they watched the show, she heard a grumble come from her sister's belly. She promptly scooted away a little bit, knowing what that grumble meant. Flareon however, did nothing. Usually, she would hold her belly, excuse herself to the bathroom, or sit on her tail, but now she didn't even react. Sylveon took a quick glance at her sister's butt. She was always fascinated by Flareon's booty, as it was the biggest out of the sisters. She occasionally catches Flareon caught in walkways due to her behind. However, she did not like the farts that came out of it. It's always unbearable and ruins the experience of being in the presence of that bottom.

         After a while, Flareon was reminded of the pressure. She thought she finally got her attention off of it, but it keeps demanding her focus. She was extremely bloated, and at any moment, she's gonna burst. What's worse is that Espeon was in the other room, doing her stretches. Her mind ran into a panic. Could she last long enough to dismiss it?
11213.title: Wait it out

choices: She gets chewed out my Espeon
112131.content:
Flareon tried her absolute best to take her mind off her gas, but the building pressure was too much to ignore. Her gut groaned and gurgled, desperate to release the pungent gas inside. Flareon held it back will all her strength, but it only delayed the inevitable blast, and poor Sylveon was right at ground zero.

Finally giving out, Flareon’s body stopped holding back the flood of gas. Immediately, a deep, bubbly fart rumbled into the couch, sending a strong vibration throughout the couch. It went on for what felt like several minutes, maintaining the meaty sound all the way through. The gas was high in sulfur and methane, and the smell proved it. Sylveon was quickly gagging, choking on Flareon’s thick, pungent gas. Even Espeon, who was in a completely different room, was coughing from the horrible smell of rotten eggs.

“Oh god, seriously Flareon!?” shouted Sylveon, as she held her nose.

Flareon could only respond with quiet, “S-Sorry...” While she was embarrassed, Flareon was also incredibly relieved after such a huge fart. It takes a lot of energy to hold such monstrous gas, after all.

Espeon walked into the room pretty quickly after that, her face a mix between disgusted and angry. Seems like Flareon is in serious trouble now...
112131.title: No, the bomb went off

113.content: Take your pick from this pair, and don't forget your free air freshener!
113.title: Vaporeon/Espeon

choices: Her farts lingered into the small Eeveelution burrow
There was an Umbreon right behind her
1131.content:
"Mmmff.." Vaporeon winced as she placed her paws on her plump stomach and pushed down, attempting to ease its pain. It just seemed to come out of nowhere for her, but the large berries she ate earlier did look a bit suspicious... Nevertheless, she had some gas to pass. She knew her stomach liked to be stubborn sometimes, but she never had issues with farting, until now. She moaned to herself, wondering what could've been preventing her from breaking wind easily. It was at that moment when an idea soon sprouted from Vaporeon's head as she began to lay on her belly and let gravity do the rest...

BBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTT!

She sighed heavily, her fart lasting a short five seconds. Due to being a water type, her flatulence tended to be wet and bubbly, and this poot was no exception. ..Still, her belly was filled with gas, but she at least knew that eventually her stomach wouldn't be bloated anymore...And instead, the air would reek of fish and rotten eggs, but she didn't care much. Vaporeon continued to rest on her gut, giggling as she lifted up her tail to expel more awful fumes. As she did this, however, she failed to notice that...
1131.title: Vaporeon

choices: She shows mercy and stays outside
11311.content:
Her foul fumes wafted into the burrow where she and her sisters lived, while she kept ripping ass obliviously. Her sisters were immediately aware of the noxious gas filling their burrow, the odor of fermented fish it carried alerting them to the perpetrator. "Gross! Vaporeon!" Espeon shouted, frantically covering her nose with her paws. Vaporeon blushed upon hearing that "Hehe... sorry about that..." she said blushing. Espeon's twin, Umbreon, was happily sniffing the rotten stench "Don't apologize, that was awesome!" she said, making Vaporeon smile. "Thanks" Vaporeon said, lifting her tail again

BBLLLLOOOORRRRRRPPPRRRRTT

Eevee giddily sniffed her big sister's stink "Wow! I want to fart like that one day!" She said. "Show some modesty, you're setting a bad example for Eevee" Espeon said, disgusted. "What are you talking about? She's a great role model" Umbreon said "She's showing us it's okay to fart" she said lifting a leg toward Espeon.

PPBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPTTT

Espeon darts away from Umbreon revolted as Umbreon sighs with relief. "Ahh~ A lesson you really need to learn". Vaporeon and Eevee laugh "Maybe I should come in there and give you all a lesson in farting" Vaporeon said smirking.
11311.title: Her farts lingered into the small Eeveelution b...

choices: They run out of the Burrow
They join in on the farting
113111.content:
Vaporeon enters their cozy burrow grinning from ear to ear "I was planning to do my business outside, but I realized I should the share the love with my family" she said shaking her butt at her sisters. "You can keep it" Leafeon said darting towards the exit, only to be tackled by Glaceon. "Where do you think you're going" Glaceon said, pining her sister down. Espeon attempted to escape as well, only to be blocked by Umbreon "How rude, trying to ditch family bonding". Sylveon and Eevee both raced to get a good view of Vaporeon's ass, while Flareon and Jolteon simply waited for the show the start. "Now then" Vaporeon said lifting her tail "Hmmph!"

PPLOOOOORRRRRRRPPT! SSSPPLLLLLRRRRRRRRRRTT! BLLLLAAAAAAAAAPPPT!

Vaporeon's bottom pumped out a series of nasty wet farts, "Take note, this is how you fart"

BBBLLLLLLOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPTT! BLLLAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRPPP!

Eevee was in awe of Vaporeon's titanic toots "Amazing!" She said closing her eyes and sniffing Vaporeon's backside. "Disgusting!" Espeon shouted between her fits of gagging, she felt ready to vomit. "I know" Umbreon said approaching Vaporeon's behind, dragging Espeon behind. "You haven't seen anything yet" Vaporeon to the excitement and horor of her sisters. Umbreon positioned herself so she could feel the full impact of Vaporeon's next blast. Vaporeon closed her eyes and frowned in concentration, ready to unleash a monster from her bowels. There was then a long silence as she focused, a silence that was broken by a horrific gurgling from her stomach, like an entire ocean was being sucked into drain. The ungodly gurgling continued for nearly a minute until Vaporeon grunted "Hnnngh!"

BBBBLLLLLLLLUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRROOOOORRRRRPPPPPPLLLLRRR RRTT!

Vaporeon's blue butt blasted a bubbly bomb of a fart at her sisters. Her emission was hot, humid, and horrifyingly stinky, as if she her stomach contained an entire swamp which just expelled out of her anus. Their home certainly felt like a swamp now, her gas had seemed to create a microclimate zone housed within their burrow. "Oh my god..." the last blast proved too much for Espeon as she vomited. Umbreon didn't even notice as she was too busy taking in the titanic bout of flatulence "Oh... Oh yeah~" she said mesmerized. The other sisters were simply in shock, unsure of what to do next.
113111.title: Vaporeon heads into the Burrow

choices: Take a berry-finding walk with Eevee
Give Eevee a front-row seat to her toots
113112.content:
As Vaporeon pondered about hopping into the burrow and really showing her sisters what she was made of, she recalled the incident when Umbreon had feasted on some beefy burritos before bedtime. The burrow reeked for a solid three days and while she had nothing against her home getting infested with stink, she realized she wasn't quite in the mood to do just that...for now, at least. "..Actually, I'll teach y'all another time. Or better yet, once my stomach's empty, I could go on another berry run with someone if anyone's interested!" She suggested happily, flicking her tail back and forth. Vaporeon's excitement forced her rump to cope with a few long, bubbly blasts to pass, which only made her even more excited, making the cycle repeat itself. She went on like this for a long two minutes, her belly roaring as loud as a Pyroar throughout the whole thing.

"Aaahhhhh, Arceus..." Vaporeon sighed. Her stomach was free from the vile gases it previously contained, most of them, at least. In fact, she was really itching to share the last of her stink with one of her sisters one-on-one, or at least hold in the rest while accumulating more with some berries. Luckily, it seemed like a certain 'vee was willing to be a possible buddy for both propositions. "Heya, Eevee!" Vaporeon greeted, watching her eager subject hop out of the burrow and stand in front of her.

"Hiiii, Vapor! It stinks sooooo much out here.." She slightly covered her nose with a paw, yet sniffed up Vaporeon's gross-smelling flatulence anyway. "C-can you.. teach me your ways?"

With a perfect opportunity in her paws, Vaporeon decided to...
113112.title: She shows mercy and stays outside

choices: One of the other eeveelutions standing behind her
11312.content:
Vaporeon's stomach started to grumble more and she sighed. She stuck her rear up in the air and put her tail back and with a grunt...

BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTT!

A big bubble fart blasts our of her rear making her plump rear jiggle. "Ahhh...." the vaporeon says in relief. She gets ready to let loose again, until she hears sniffing noise. She stands up and looks behind her to see Umbreon inches away from her rump smelling her fumes. She gasps and lets loose another fart. "W-what are you doing?!" Vaporeon asks as she turns around feeling a bit embarrassed. "Oh Vaporeon. You know I love farts." Umbreon replies with a smirk. "But yours are my favorite out of all of them." she says as she sniffs the air. Vaporeon eases herself a bit, "O-oh... really?" she stutters. "Yes, of course." Umbreon assures her. Vaporeon turned to her side and lifted her leg up...

BBBBBRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPP!

Another bubbly fart explodes from her plump rear. Umbreon smiles and sniffs as the air in delight. Vaporeon sees her sniffing and turned her wobbly butt towards her...

BBRRRRRT! BBBRRRRRRRRRT! BRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPP!

A sequence of juicy blasts sputter from Vaporeon's butt. Umbreon places her head against Vaporeon's plump butt and sticks her nose in her crack and begins sniffing a lot. Vaporeon felt Umbreon and wiggled her butt in her face and dug head Umbreon's head further in her sweaty crack. Vaporeon flexed her cheeks to get Umbreon secured so she could get the full experience. Umbreon waited in anticipation for the next blast.

BBBBBBBBBRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTT!

Umbreon felt Vaporeon's cheeks jiggle against her face as a big and long juicy fart smacked her in the face and traveled up her nostrils. She sniffed wildly at the fumes. "Hey Umbreon, I have a better idea." Vaporeon said as she farted on Umbreon again. Umbreon pulled her face out panting a bit, "Y-yeah? What is it?" Umbreon replied. Vaporeon turned and pointed at the ground, "Lay down on your back." she said. Umbreon laid down and waited for what was going to happen next. "Perfect!" Vaporeon said as she backed up over the Umbreon. Umbreon stared up at the looming moon of a rump before it sat down on her face and dug her face in between the cheeks and sweat covered her. "Comfy down there? Vaporeon said with a giggle. Umbreon nodded under the layers of flesh and planted her paws on the big cheeks. Vaporeon grunted...

BBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTT! BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAATTTTTTT! BBBRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTT! BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTT! BBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTT! BBBRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAATTTTTTTTT!

More bubbly farts erupted from Vaporeon and straight onto Umbreon's face. Umbreon sniffed deeply with each fart enjoying the gaseous scent and massaged Vaporeon's cheeks. As Vaporeon releases another gas bomb, she notices...
11312.title: There was an Umbreon right behind her

114.content: Aaaand you've chosen from my two favorites.
114.title: Umbreon/Glaceon

choices: Take one of your sisters with you
You take too long, and let it rip right there.
1141.content:
The moment that Umbreon woke up, she knew that today was going to be a gassy day. The immense pressure she felt in her gut told exactly that. She needed to fart very soon, but she was surrounded by her sisters. All of them asleep, happily dreaming about various things. If Umbreon was to let it rip right then and there, she would certainly wake everyone up. She could also just leave and let out some gas outside, but another idea tempted her. She could take one of her sisters with her to torture them with her plentiful gas, too.

         Umbreon was about to burst with gas, so she needed to make a decision, quickly.
1141.title: Umbreon

choices: Hide in the bushes and hold it
Hide in the bushes and let out some silent ones
11411.content:
She couldn't had it any longer so she quickly ran outside the den and laid on her tummy. Then it happened.....

PHRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTT!

She felt a bit of relief but still felt more coming her way.

BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRT!

The smells from her farts started going into her sister's den.
11411.title: Rip some gas outside, alone.

choices: What’s the worst that could happen?
1142.content:
Clair and her prized Glaceon were known across the region both for their fearsome battle tactics as well as for the pairs very peculiar relationship.

Clair loves farts and her partner, Glaceon obviously loves farting. More than several trainers have caught Clair face deep in her Pokémon’s ass, sucking down fart after fart and immediately paid for snooping with a punishing defeat

Today was no different from any other. Glaceon was finished with her training and alerted the trainer with her growling stomach. Clair checked her bags, they had been in between towns for about two days now and were running low on food.

Just when things spelled ‘starvation’ for the girls, Clair managed to find a wrapped up, half eaten tin of Pecha Berry Pie. The two looked at each other inquisitively..” are we really gonna eat this? I mean, it’s not moldy so it can’t be that old, right?” Clair thought out loud.
1142.title: Glaceon

choices: Glaceon presses her ass to Clairs face
11421.content:
Clair shrugged and began to cut out a larger slice for her Pokemon since Glaceon just finished all that exercise. Glaceon happily ate down her portion as Clair followed

The sun began to set and Clair set up the tent to sleep for the night. Soon after the tent was and the pair climbed in Glaceons stomach began to rumble violently.
11421.title: What’s the worst that could happen?

114213.content:
Glaceon didn’t pay much mind to the noise as she began to settle in for the night, laying down beside her trainer. However, the noises only grew louder as time went on, soon becoming too loud for Glaceon to be able to sleep. Now she knew she was going to have to pass some gas if she wanted any sleep tonight. She then looked over at Clair, before a smile grew on her face. If she needed to rip some, she might as well have some fun with it.

Hopping onto Clair’s body, Glaceon turned herself around so that her rear was facing Clair’s face, and pressed her ass back. Glaceon knew Clair wouldn’t mind, they had done this so many times it was almost routine.

The rumbling from within didn’t sound like it was calming down, and some pressure was starting to build. So, Glaceon deflated herself a bit by blasting a loud, brassy fart right into Clair’s face, the powerful odor of rotten berries quickly filling up the small tent space. Glaceon didn’t really care if Clair woke up or not, she was going to rip some mean farts regardless.
114213.title: Glaceon presses her ass to Clairs face

1142131.content:
Clair was awakened by her beloved Pokémon’s rancid ass like it was the worlds worst smelling salts. However, the young trainer didn’t mind in the slightest and even placed a hand on her Pokémon’s backside.

As if it were on cue, Clair opened her mouth and received a raunchy, sputtering fart in return that she happily gulped down. The Glaceon giggled as she was really letting it rip, enjoying watching her trainer suck down her nasty gas as if it were oxygen.

It was almost hard to tell who owned who anymore..
1142131.title: Continue

115.content: Which'll it be? Leafeon, or Sylveon?
115.title: Leafeon/Sylveon

1152.content:
One evening, in the peaceful forest where the Eeveelutions lived, a certain Fairy-type found a Trainer's lunch, and, being a curious one, found a way to open it. Inside was a grand assortment of food!... Okay, it wasn't exactly 'grand,' but a large Oran Berry pie, along with six smaller pies made from varying berries was definitely grand to the gluttonous Sylveon. With very little fanfare, she gorged herself on the array of sweets and left before the Trainer could return.

However, by the time she made it back to the burrow in which she and her eight friends lived, the wheels of indigestion had already begun to turn, churning in her gut and brewing up a storm... after all, mixing seven different types of berries is bound to cause a commotion in one's belly.

What happens in the next chapter?
1152.title: Sylveon Chapter 1 - Gassylveon

11521.content: Sylveon's tummy was feeling upset all of a sudden. Then she realized she had bad gass. She couldn't let the others hear her smelly fairy wind so she told Eevee to come outside with her. When they were finally outside she quickly stuffed Eevee between her cheeks.
11521.title: Sylveon Chapter 2A - Gassy So Soon?

115211.content: She let out big sloppy farts right into Eevee's face which she was trying to get away, but Sylveon used her ribbons and forced Eevee's face between her cheeks. She started farting again into her face. Soon she letting out bigger and stinky farts in which Eevee was disgusted.
115211.title: Big farts

1152111.content:
After some toots into Eevee's face, Sylveon felt all her gas was moving down into rear end. She had to let it out. It started out of a silent fart but then turned into a giant bassy farts that smelled of all sorts of berries that smelt terrible and the fart ended with a 30 second long silent fart.

" Wow that was amazing!~ " Sylveon said as she released her grip. " Yea I bet older sister! " Eevee said as she went to den to lye down after that.
1152111.title: Let it all out

12.content: Now that we've got gender all taken care of, who would you like to focus on?
12.title: Male

choices: search for  trainer what take the "attack"
121.content:
our little glutton was kind of bored taking a walk in the forest. his stomach rumbles from time to time but it was nothing he couldn't blow.

He found a bush that had all kinds of berries and you know.... He needs charge more the tank.

without thinking twice he threw himself into eating the berries.he devoured them as if he hadn't eaten all day and you can see how his stomach gets bigger. He did not leave a berry but as he was eating very fast he did not realize that some were rotten.

Our eevee back to walk whit a big stomach and no problems.

As fast as the berries entered, the berries already want to leave.

How will he "release" the berries?
121.title: Eevee!

122.content: Alright, so you've chosen the Kanto bunch. Now's your chance to narrow it down and start your story.
122.title: Kanto Eeveelutions!

choices: A sibling was watching Flareon leave, and followed him!
1221.content:
Now, Flareon always considered himself one of the more mature siblings, having the decency to hold his gas in public. So it was poetically ironic by the time Flareon realized he was, without a doubt, one of the most flatulent of the bunch. Of course, Umbreon and Eevee were always so eager to see him let out some gas, but Espeon and Leafeon wouldn’t take very kindly to gas invading their breathing space. So, Flareon settled with taking his gaseous outbursts outside, and preferably somewhere private.

Fast forward to today, and Flareon was waking up bright and early in the day, as he usually did. Then came the usual gas in his gut, which almost immediately needed dealing with. Luckily, everyone else should be asleep, so Flareon left the burrow in search for his usual “venting” spot.
1221.title: Flareon!

123.content:
The Johto duo! As different as day and night!

The classy, yet woefully-gassy Espeon, or Umbreon, who almost seems to take pride in his bubbly belly?
123.title: Solar Flares, or a Full Moon?

choices: He miraculously makes it to the entrance without incident!
Some other social butterfly makes life even harder for him.
The poor Psychic-type lets one slip...
1231.content:
It was the day of an important gathering regarding the local Exploration Guild, a high-profile event involving many of the most well-known teams in the area, along with some of the new up-and-coming contenders in the exploration scene. If you wanted any iota of publicity, you would be crazy not to show up and mingle a bit. One particular guest was Espeon, the leader of Team Evo-- an exploration team consisting entirely of Eeveelution siblings. He was a rather charismatic Pokémon, and would normally be eager to be up-front and socializing!... but there was a problem... The Psychic-type groaned lowly in discomfort, his twin-tipped tail flicking nervously as he glanced uneasily at the crowd of other explorers who had shown up. Vaporeon had thrown a nice lunch together for him, sure, but he'd forgotten to consider that maybe it was a bit too much to eat right before a sophisticated event like this. His belly grumbled and churned softly, working diligently away at his meal... It wasn't much of a problem at first. A bit of indigestion was nothing new for Espeon, after all! He managed to get some small talk in with a few other Pokémon, and it wasn't until he wrapped up conversation with a rather cool-headed Scolipede that he felt a low pressure beginning to bubble up inside him... his cue to slip out and find somewhere private for a little bit. Before he could actually act on that thought, though, he heard a small voice call out from his right, "Hey! Hey, you!"

         A friendly-looking Zigzagoon dashed up, practically hopping in place once they got close. "You're that Espeon that drifted in with the other Eeveelutions, right?" they asked, sporting a big grin. Espeon silently cursed his luck, but kept his cool, responding simply with, "Mmhm.~ The one and only. Have we met, perchance?" In response, Zigzagoon just shook their head rapidly, and barked out, "Nope! Spotted one of the others out in the market! You all seem like a nice bunch!"
         Before Espeon could say anything in response, a dull ache in his gut reminded him of the growing pressure bubbling within. The Eeveelution decided that it was best to excuse himself, but barely managed to get out, "Excuse me, I really should--" before the Normal-type continued with questions such as "So, where are you guys from? You siblings? Best friends? Somethin' else?" and a plethora of other questions that just gave Espeon's tummy trouble more time to get worse.
         By the time the purple-furred Psychic managed to get a word in and excuse himself, he'd inadvertently allowed quite a bit of gas to build up. Enough, in fact, that he was finding himself feeling rather bloated, and wasn't quite sure if he could keep his gas in until he got out the door and somewhere private. A single wrong step, and he could kiss his chances of being known as anything more than "That one Espeon that stank up the whole Guild Hall"... Even so, waiting was just going to make things worse, so Espeon began carefully and methodically making his way to the entrance, trying to avoid socialization, and for Arceus' sake, trying his best not to fart.

What happens next?
1231.title: The Charmer

choices: ... subside without event, but convince him that he needs to leave now.
... break his concentration-- his efforts only delayed the inevitable.
12312.content:
Every step felt like a risk, sending quiet burbling through Espeon's lightly-bloated belly and gradually increasing the urge to just let rip here and now... but he was slowly-but-surely getting close to the exit. Once he made his way out, there was nothing stopping him from ducking into some well-hidden alcove and "de-pressurizing" as loudly as he pleased while preserving his dignity. Unfortunately for the lovely, lilac-furred feline, fate threw him another curveball as another friendly face approached, eager to chat. This time, the one holding him up was a Luxio. He didn't particularly have time to chat at this point-- the Zigzagoon from earlier had already gotten him dangerously close to gassing the place with all the small-talk they'd dragged him into-- but... he could possibly buy a few minutes just so that he didn't seem rude by brushing off a conversation.

         As the Electric-type came close, Espeon took a calculated risk, using Psychic to... ahem... bottle himself up, so to speak. It wasn't an ideal solution, of course. It didn't do anything to stop the indigestion that was causing him to be so gassy in the first place, and it required quite a bit of concentration to maintain, but he could keep it up for a good while... at least, that's what he thought. He took initiative in initiating conversation this time, starting off with, "Well, hello. You're certainly a friendly face, coming to talk to me out of the blue like this." The Luxio tilted their head and smiled, their tail swishing back and forth as they gave their reply. "Of course I'm going to talk to you-- you're new in town! Word spreads quickly, you know."
"Is that so? I'll have to keep that in mind before I get into any trouble!" the Eeveelution joked in response, giving a little chuckle. The Luxio seemed to find it kind of funny, too, but cattish curiosity soon took hold, and they inquired, "So, are you a lone explorer, or are you part of a team?" Once again, however, before Espeon could formulate a response, another cramp of a higher magnitude gripped his belly, an audible bubbling of protest sounding off from it and coaxing another uncomfortable groan from Espeon himself. His conversational partner, reasonably concerned, completely dropped their prior question in favor of, "Are... are you alright?"


Espeon's gas pains...
12312.title: High-risk Rapport

choices: ... he had a feeling he was going to be gassy all night.
... the Luxio from earlier had tracked him down.
123121.content:
There was no way around it. Espeon could feel his concentration being whittled down by the pain wracking his gurgling, gassy gut. There wasn't anything he could do about it-- he was going to fart, and everyone was going to think of him as some disgusting, unmannerly gasbag forever. Fortunately, just moments before his Psychic weakened to the point that all that pent-up gas could escape, Espeon felt a wave of relief wash over him as the cramps left him as quickly as they came. He took a moment to regain his composure, but that moment of panic, along with the fact that he felt even more bloated than before (and his belly showed no signs of slowing down the gas production), clued him in to something-- he legitimately couldn't afford to dally around for another minute. Another pang like that and his reputation was as good as ruined.

         First off, he reassured the Electric-type that he was, indeed, just fine and dandy (a baldfaced lie), then brought up that he needed to leave and that he was sorry for cutting their conversation short. Then, he left the guild hall and slunk oh-so-cautiously to a small grotto hidden in a cliff face not too far off-- but far enough that nobody would think to check there unless they were tailing him. He waited for a good minute or two, just making sure that nobody had followed him... then, growing impatient for fear of those dreaded aches returning in force, Espeon let his concentration on his Psychic slip. Almost immediately, a loud Bppppffwwwwrrrt! thundered out, followed by a couple smaller Pfffrrrt...s and a brrRAAAAPPffff...~ that was comfortably in the middle volume-wise... the feeling of relief for Espeon's poor tummy was immeasurable, but his little hiding spot already stank just from those smaller blasts.

Unfortunately for Espeon...
123121.title: Narrowly Escaping Embarrassment

choices: Nothing. Hold it in and get this Luxio to leave Espeon peacefully.
1231212.content:
Espeon was finally alone, and he planned on letting all his built-up gas out! Even if it killed all the nearby plants; Espeon couldn’t care less! BbrrrAAApp Another loud fart blasted out, reeking even more than last time! Espeon sighed loudly, the pressure in his gut was alleviated once more. However, he still had loads more gas ready to rip, and that’s exactly what he was going to do!

         Oh, but fate would be cruel to poor Espeon this day, as he was just about to let another one rip, but he suddenly heard the rustling of leaves nearby. Espeon stopped immediately, his stomach groaning in disapproval. From the bushes, came the Luxio from before! Just what did he want with Espeon, and why was he being so annoying?

         “Hey, sorry if I scared you, but there was something else I wanted to ask. You seem like a nice guy, so I was wondering where I could meet you again.”

         Espeon couldn’t believe how annoying this Luxio was being right now. He interrupts Espeon’s private time, and further prevents him from passing gas? Espeon was quite frustrated, he ‘ought to tackle that Luxio right now, and use him as a gas cushion! He could teach this Luxio a lesson on knowing when to stop bothering someone!

         Espeon’s gut groaned angrily, his gas was only building up further. Just what should he do?
1231212.title: ... the Luxio from earlier had tracked him down.

choices: "Are you okay? You're looking a bit nervous..."
12312121.content:
Espeon pushed the urge to tackle this Luxio and gas him out aside-- his reputation couldn't take a hit like that. Instead, the Psychic-type cleared his throat, closing his eyes and using Psychic to put a stopper on the raging storm in his gut again. Now that he'd vented some pressure, it was a bit easier to keep his gas contained, thank Arceus. He sat on the ground and turned to look at the other feline.

         "Ah... you'd like to meet me again? Well, that's certainly flattering... If you're so sure you'd like to be friends, I can typically be found at the Spinda Café, just east of town." He explained, smiling and trying to ignore the fact that he felt like a balloon... The good news is that once they left, there was nothing left to keep him from venting all this gas...

         The Luxio nodded, smiling warmly at Espeon. "Thanks! Ah... one more thing, though." Espeon's blood went cold. What could this Luxio possibly have to say?
12312121.title: A New Friend... Possibly.

12312122.content:
Espeon sighed in annoyance, this kid was certainly a pain! “I’ll teach you some manners, boy” the jewel in Espeons forehead began to glow as the Luxio went stiff “w-what’s going on!?” he began to cry out not before being muffled under the psychic type Pokémon’s shapely butt.

“I apologize for this but you were in the wrong place at the right time” Espeon said as he started to rip fart after fart into the flailing electric types face. Espeon sighed again but in relief, as he let loose a ten second wet fart directly down the Luxio’s throat. “Again I’m sorry kid, but on the bright side you did a great job sucking up those farts!” Espeon said as the electric types face left his ass with a nasty squelch.
12312122.title: Show this Electric-type what for!

123122.content:
No, nonono... this was bad... Espeon's concentration was rapidly waning as his bloated belly ached and cramped, the discomfort of it all distracting him from his Psychic... at this rate, he was going to... g-going to...
PFFFWBBBRRRAAAAP!
Before he could even finish his thoughts, Espeon's fears all came true at once as a loud fart blasted from his backside, gaining him the attention (and, as far as he could tell, disgust) of most of the Pokémon present. A rosy red blush of unimaginable embarrassment immediately flushed over his cheeks as he immediately recognized his faux pas, and before he knew it, he was fleeing back to his team's little home right outside of town, little squeaks of gas escaping despite his best efforts and... probably just drawing more attention to his current gassy state to any Pokémon that weren't attending the event.

         Maybe he'd show up again someday, in a year or two, and NOT make the mistake of eating a big lunch beforehand, but... as it was now, he was too afraid to even show his face around town, let alone in the very place he broke wind. As far as he was concerned, his dream of being a great adventurer was shattered by one little mistake.
123122.title: Espeon Blows It

124.content:
The Sinnoh superstars! A marvelous choice!

Glaceon, whose cool, collected outward appearance hides inner turmoil (both physically and mentally)...

... or Leafeon, whose long days of relying on sunlight have left his stomach sensitive and quick to bloat up after even the most innocuous of meals?
124.title: The Northern Wind and the Spring Breeze

choices: Just a few won’t hurt, right?
1242.content:
Today, we find Leafeon laying on his back, relaxing and soaking up the sunshine. Not only was it quite nice, but sunlight was also his main source of nutrition! Every day for the past week, Leafeon has been sitting in the sun as his way of food. While his method was more than enough to sustain himself, it also left his stomach the most sensitive it has been for a long time. Just the smallest of meals would likely have very gaseous results!

         Feeling satisfied, Leafeon stood up and began to make his way back to his cave that he shared with his brothers. It was a little cramped, but it didn’t bother Leafeon much. What did bother him was all the farting his brothers partake in. Espeon was the only other one who shared his distaste for their farting, though Espeon’s dislike of it was a lot stronger. Sometimes, one his brothers have a really gassy day, and completely stink up the cave! Fortunately, no one has been that gassy since Umbreon had all those burritos. Leafeon still shivers slightly from the smell.

         The cave was just in sight, but something caught Leafeon’s eye. A bush full of Pecha berries were just to the side of the path. Pecha berries were Leafeon’s favorite, but he knew that they were also going to make him gassy. And, after going a week with just sunlight for food, his stomach is certainly extremely sensitive.

         Just what will Leafeon do?
1242.title: Leafeon!

choices: Not too bad-- he gradually starts feeling gassy
Like a ton of bricks-- four was too many~
12422.content:
Leafeon gave a hard, long stare at the Pecha bush, then glanced away, trying to put them out of his mind. Even before he evolved and learned how to photosynthesize, the berries had always been a bit of a guilty pleasure for him-- in spite of their succulence and delightfully-sweet taste, they had a nasty habit of stirring up a fair amount of gas in his gut. It was probably a family thing, as most of his siblings felt the same effects from them as well, but... well, he figured that it wouldn't be too bad if he only had a few.

         The Grass-type approached the bush, carefully plucking a particularly plump-looking berry off a branch and tucking into it. Every bit as delicious as he remembered! After scarfing down that first berry, Leafeon chowed down on a second, and a third... it was a couple of bites into his fourth before an audible gurgling from his belly tipped him off that he might have overdone it a bit, and that maybe it was a good idea to quit... After some brief deliberation, Leafeon decided that it was best to stop after berry #4, and finished it off as quickly as possible, letting off a very light uuurrrpfh... afterwards.

         Despite his better judgment (considering he'd just loaded up on Pecha berries), Leafeon finished his trek to the cave, giving a little glance around upon his entry. He wasn't gassy quite yet, and had confidence that once the berries stewing in his stomach DID start stirring up trouble, it'd be more of a slow burn. He only had four, after all... that couldn't possibly cause TOO much of a disturbance. Now, to see who else was present... Glaceon... Sylveon... Espeon! Leafeon perked up as he noticed the presence of his closest brother, sidling up to him and engaging in small talk, almost completely forgetting about the fact that his belly was practically a ticking time bomb.

How hard do those Pecha berries hit once Leafeon starts feeling their effects?
12422.title: Leafeon's Mistake

choices: One of his brothers stop him
124222.content:
Unfortunately, it seemed that Leafeon underestimated the sensitivity of his stomach! It wasn’t even that long ago, and his stomach is already giving him a lot of trouble! In the middle of one of Espeon’s rants about nothing in particular, a monumental amount of pressure emerged deep within Leafeon. It all came from nowhere! Leafeon even winced in slight pain from how fast the gas came about! Then, he felt it move lower and lower, making its way down his intestines.

gggrrrbbbrrlllll

         This was bad, Leafeon was going to get monumental gas very soon. He needed to leave before he drops a stink bomb inside their home! Once Espeon ended his small rant, Leafeon excused himself from the conversation. He stood up, and began to make his way outside. It was going to be a longer walk than normal to the entrance. He just had to go sit with Espeon all the way back of their home, didn’t he? Leafeon took small, methodical step, careful to not shake up the large volume of gas making its way through his system any more than he has to.

         Will he make it outside?
124222.title: Like a ton of bricks-- four was too many~

choices: Spotted a Pokemon heading towards him!
Noticed one of his brothers coming his way
125.content:
Deep in the forest resided a Sylveon who was taking a much-deserved rest up against a tall, towering tree. He was very thankful for his whole body being covered in the tree's lengthy shade because any sort of discomfort could cause his now bloated stomach to act more agitated than it already was! Sylveon, being the adorable Pokemon he was, convinced a wandering Pokemon trainer to give him the fast food meal they were about to devour for themselves: A beefy hamburger complete with melted cheese, crunchy lettuce, juicy tomato slices, spicy onions, and tasty ketchup, along with some crispy fries as a side and a large orange soda to wash it all down. To say that he enjoyed it would be an understatement, and an even bigger one for his stomach's satisfaction too. It viciously churned away at the greasy food before it turned into intestinal gas, way more that Sylveon could actually handle. His belly was the size of a basketball and burbled softly while he moaned for help, hoping that someone would aid him...

But alas, was he really in any actual danger? Heck no! Sylveon just loved deceiving others with his seemingly cute demeanor and he had just the plan thought up. Hold back on passing gas until someone comes, ask them to rub his belly, act apologetic after a few accidental farts, then turn on the naive victim and sit upon their face for what'll feel like hours. He couldn't wait!

Like, 'honest to Arceus' couldn't wait. His belly was getting tighter by the minute and it was only a matter of time before he would legitimately need help. Staying strong and letting some time pass, the Sylveon...
125.title: A Sylveon in Distress..?

1251.content:
A passing Emolga wandered by, smiling brightly. She had just won her very first battle, and her trainer was quite proud. Her trainer actually let her wander around and find some of her favorite berries.

"Hmm...Now where did I find 'em? They were big and red...Juicy too."

Sylveon giggled, spotting the emolga.
"Hey there! You looking for something?" he asked innocently.

"Oh- Well I was looking for these super yummy berries but- I dunno where to find them...Can you help me look?"
She smiled brightly.

Sylveon returned the smile.
"Sure thing."
He 'looked' in a nearby bush, sticking his plump butt straight out.

The emolga looked in the bush next to him, sticking out her tongue.
She popped her head out, only to be met with a face full of fluffy ass.

"I-I can't find it in here."
She blushed.

BBBBBBBBBLLLLLLRRRRRTTTTT

A bassy fart rumbled into her face.

"O-Oh.."

Sylveon poked his head out.
"Sorry~ Did I get you?~ I'm a bit gassy right now~"

"I-It's fine! Everybody does it!"

The truth was...That fart honestly made her...
1251.title: Spotted a Pokemon heading towards him!

choices: Sylveon suddenly halts in his tracks, causing an embarrassing collision...
They finally encounter some more bushes.
12511.content:
Oh Arceus, he really stinks... The Emolga thought to herself while a small blush formed on her face. She covered it to both hide the blush and her near silent sniffing. Hope he doesn't notice...

Sylveon laughed at the Emolga's measly remark. "Well, I'm not quite like 'everyone,' to be honest. In fact..." He held up a paw before his stomach started to make some bubbling noises. "There's plenty more where that came from~!"

The Emolga's pupils dilated. "O-oh, um...you don't say..." She said, keeping one arm over her nose to at least pretend that she didn't like the eggy scent floating around her. She kept her gaze locked onto the seemingly nonchalant Sylveon while he grinned at her.

"Heh, I do say!" He responded, blinking at the Emolga. "It won't be a problem while we look for some berries, will it?" After watching her shake her head no, he cleared his throat. "Well then! Guess these bushes are berry-less, we should look elsewhere for the time being, I'll lead the way~" Sylveon began to march off in a sorta random direction, but in such a confident manner regardless.

"Hm..." The Emolga said to herself, tilting her head a little. She could've sworn the way she was being lead had little to no bushes whatsoever, but she already burdened him with the task of helping her find berries, she figured she might as well continue to tag along with him. "I'm coming!" The Emolga announced reassuringly, scurrying towards Sylveon...but specifically remaining behind him. His butt's so soft-looking too... She pondered, completely mesmerized.

As the two Pokemon trotted forward...
12511.title: A bit excited..

choices: Sylveon has Emolga all figured out~
125111.content:
The two ended walking for so long that the Emolga had completely forgotten what she was even doing now, her every thought focused solely on the two wobbling orbs in front of her face. Not only was it a view to die for, but she could even catch a whiff of his amazing eggy fumes that hung around on his butt. However, she would soon get much closer to those cheeks than she had initially anticipated...

         Out of nowhere, Sylveon stopped dead in his tracks, not even giving the Emolga behind him a warning. This resulted in her face instantly plunging in between those cheeks. It was then that she found out just how soft they were, and how much they stunk. Sylveon’s rear reeked of past farts, and frankly, Emolga couldn’t get enough of it. But, she soon got more as the impact spooked Sylveon just enough for him to let a fart slip.

BBBBBBBbbbBBRRRRRRRrrrRRrrLLLLlllLLLLTTT!!!

“Whoops, sorry~!”

         It was a deep, bassy blast to the Emolga’s face, filling her nostrils with nothing but Sylveon’s eggy funk. It took Emolga all of her willpower not to start huffing up the gas like a crazed Pokémon, rather allowing the fumes to flow into her lungs. If only she could have her way, she’d stay right here in Sylveon’s ass, but she didn’t want to weird out Sylveon. So much to her dismay, Emolga pulled herself free, faking a cough or two to make it seem a little convincing.
125111.title: Sylveon suddenly halts in his tracks, causing a...

1252.content:
It was the youngest of the brothers, Eevee. He was the most naive of the brothers, and was used as a gas cushion by the rest of his brothers. Though, he didn’t mind it at all, because he looked up to his brothers, and their gas. He wanted to learn how to fart they did! Even if that meant taking their gas head on!

         He was exploring around the forest, and heard Sylveon’s cry. Coming to investigate, he was met with the sight of Sylveon, and his over-sized gut! Worried, he rushed over to Sylveon.

Eevee: Sylveon! Is something wrong? Are you hurt?
1252.title: Noticed one of his brothers coming his way

12521.content: Sylveon brought his attention over to his caring brother and flashed a nervous smile at him. "Hey Eevee...I'm okay, it's just that my stomach's been acting up real bad lately." He edged himself closer to Eevee, his bulbous gut just barely coming in contact with the Pokemon before it gurgled lightly. "Y'know, as usual." He said with a shrug and weak chuckle. "Say, would you mind being a pal and giving this stomach of mine some rubs?" Sylveon gave Eevee his best 'hopeless and in need of help' look ever, already expecting him to help out but just wishing to convince him even further.
12521.title: Showtime...

125211.content:
“Sure thing!”

         Eevee wasn’t going to say no, despite knowing what would result. However, Sylveon’s added charm made him forget that fact. His brother was in need of comforting, so how could he say no? So, Eevee put his paws right on Sylveon’s enormous gut. He could feel little bubbles of gas, along with the powerful vibrations that came with every gurgle and groan. Eevee didn’t waste any time before rubbing his paws around, trying to cover as much area as he could.

         “How’s this? Is this good?”
125211.title: His charming demeanor works!

choices: Eevee keeps rubbing, despite his better judgment
1252112.content:
"Mmm~ just a little more"

Sylveon purred happily as Eevee rubbed his big bloated belly, its rumbling getting louder and louder. He felt the gas building up in his tummy until he couldn't hold it any longer, the pressure was just too much! Sylveon let off a massive fart, hitting poor Eevee right in the face with a big hot blast of greasy, meaty gas, sighing with relief. Eevee backed away, desperately trying to fan the stinky fumes away.

"Ewww, Sylveon!" He gasped.

"Hehe, sorry. Just a few toots, you've smelled worse." Sylveon giggled, smiling sweetly. "Could you keep going? That felt soooo good."

Sylveon peered over at Eevee, with his innocent smile and big sparkling eyes. Who could resist such an adorable face, even if he stank like hell.
1252112.title: Hmmm...Maybe a little more~

12521121.content:
On the inside, Eevee’s common sense told him that he should stop now, before this gets any worse for his nose. He shouldn’t keep going. Yet, Sylveon had the poor Eevee in a trance, his glimmering eyes easing away all of his worries.That charismatic smile was telling Eevee that it was going to be fine. Not only that, but his love of stink made him crave for more, to keep going, to get more putrid fumes.

“N-no problem~”

Despite his better judgment, Eevee went back to rubbing and massaging Sylveon’s massive bloated gut. It rumbled and gurgled, quickly resulting in another beefy blast. Eevee’s nose began to burn, the smell even forcing a cough from him. It was already incredibly strong, and Eevee had a feeling it was only getting worse. Yet, he was excited for it, to be hit with the terrible odor of Sylveon’s ass gas.
12521121.title: Eevee keeps rubbing, despite his better judgment

choices: They are stopped by several pokemon on the way
125211211.content:
Sylveon giggled as his little brother rubbed his bloated belly and took a deep whiff of the air around them. “Big Bro.. I don’t mind you umm..letting it rip.” Eevee said a little muffled as his face turned red saying so.

“Of course you don’t lil bro! That’s why you haven’t evolved yet, to smell and worship your superior brother’s!” Sylveon declared pushing his little brother further into his trance and closer to his pucker, letting a nasty ass blast fly out hitting eevee in the nose.

Sylveon was right.. “I won’t ever evolve, my brothers need an obedient cushion” eevee repeated to himself as he sniffed his brother’s asshole. Just then, Sylveon thought to himself as he farted in his little brother’s face.

“C’mon kid, lets go show everyone that you’ve accepted your fate. Espeon said this would be hard!”
125211211.title: Continue

info.brief_description: Everyone's favorite Pokémon deal with some gassy predicaments~
info.description: Our favorite 9 Pokémon experience horrible gas as a result of likely-upset tummies~
